name: Christopher W. Evans
description: My name is Chris Evans. Currently, I live in Portland Maine and work at Tilson Technology. I went to Highschool in Limestone Maine, and am finishing up a gap year as a fulltime GIS Technician before moving onto being Computer Science student at UMass Amherst in the fall. During the summer I am planning on taking a break while I continue to pursue my interests in bowling, software development, and painting.
